data.client_settings: Stable, Build Number: 18240, also happens on current Canary
data.actual_result: Spotify status disappears as soon as the 10 minutes of inactivity pass, once you come back to your PC, the status is back too
data.expected_result: Spotify status keeps going regardless if you go afk or not
data.short_description: Spotify Rich Presence disappears when you automatically go afk (10 min of no activity)
data.steps_to_repro: - Play any song, presence works fine - Wait 10 minutes without touching your PC so you automatically go away on Discord - Watch as Spotify status disappears
